Detailed Description

Implements the TwitPic image uploading service API.

Member Function Documentation

wxString TwitPic::GetMimeType ( const wxString &  extension  )  [static, private]

Helper function to get mime type from file extension.

Returns generic 'application/octet-stream' if no mime type is found.

Parameters:
extension the file extension to find a mime type for
Returns:
the mime type or application/octet-stream if none is found
